content.html: ⭐️ I wrote another thing! ⭐️ It's a markdown transformer that converts a web address into a beautiful website preview, much like Twitter does. It's built on @kentcdodds remark-embedder/core and uses @selbekk Open Graph Ninja API cc: @MichaelDeBoey93 github.com/donavon/transf…
content.value:
⭐️ I wrote another thing! ⭐️

It's a markdown transformer that converts a web address into a beautiful website preview, much like Twitter does. It's built on @kentcdodds remark-embedder/core and uses @selbekk Open Graph Ninja API

cc: @MichaelDeBoey93 

github.com/donavon/transf…
